showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // “Sir, that entrance is for the

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // “Crap!
I still don't have enough points.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “Mmm? You're new here, aren't you?
Then, you want an explanation
of the Battle Arena?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // “You fight here and collect
battle points.
You can then exchange
those points for prizes.”{PAUSE}“The Battle Game…even though it's a game
you still use all your physical abilities.
To participate,
go to the front and pay yer GP's.”{PAUSE}“You can fight in up to eight battles.
The more you win,
the more battle points you get.”{PAUSE}“But, if you lose,
you lose all your points
So it's up to you whether
or not to fight after each win.”{PAUSE}“They also make
it harder by givin' out handicaps.”{PAUSE}“They decide what
handicaps there'll be, and
you won't know what
you're up against until the battle.”{PAUSE}“Oh yeah, once you leave the Battle area,
all your battle points will
become useless. So watch it.”{PAUSE}“Oh, and one more thing. The maximum
points you could get is 65000,
no more. So if you get that many
you should exchange them for something.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // “Crap!
I still don't have enough points.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // “Ha ha ha!
Well, good luck.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // “What, you too?
With the way things are in the world,
It makes you wonder
what we're doin' here?”{PAUSE}“Well, it's a little late for me
to run around now,
so I do what I love,
it works best for me.”{PAUSE}“Oh, by the way, did you know?
I heard that there's going to be a battle
and only the strongest
will be allowed to participate.”{PAUSE}“But what do they mean by 'strongest'?
If ya ask me I'll say it's 'weapons.'”{PAUSE}“But, there's gotta be a way
to measure this, too.
Mmm, we need
another way to measure strength.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // “Man, I knew I should've stopped.
But it's so hard to stop…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // “Maybe I could've made it a little further.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // “I'll give that Meteor my ultra kick…

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // “All right, it should be my turn
comin' up here soon.”

dialogStrings: Arena Lobby

“Whenever you come to the Gold Saucer,
I recommend you visit the owner's museum
at least once.”

“Crap!
I still don't have enough points.”
“Hmm…”

“So, uh, how've things been since then?”
{CHOICE}No sweat
{CHOICE}They're going
“Hmm, pretty good.”

“Ha ha ha!
Well, good luck.”

“Mmm? You're new here, aren't you?
Then, you want an explanation
of the Battle Arena?”

{CHOICE}Yeah
{CHOICE}Not interested

“What, you too?
With the way things are in the world,
It makes you wonder
what we're doin' here?”{PAUSE}“Well, it's a little late for me
to run around now,
so I do what I love,
it works best for me.”{PAUSE}“Oh, by the way, did you know?
I heard that there's going to be a battle
and only the strongest
will be allowed to participate.”{PAUSE}“But what do they mean by 'strongest'?
If ya ask me I'll say it's 'weapons.'”{PAUSE}“But, there's gotta be a way
to measure this, too.
Mmm, we need
another way to measure strength.”

“You fight here and collect
battle points.
You can then exchange
those points for prizes.”{PAUSE}“The Battle Game…even though it's a game
you still use all your physical abilities.
To participate,
go to the front and pay yer GP's.”{PAUSE}“You can fight in up to eight battles.
The more you win,
the more battle points you get.”{PAUSE}“But, if you lose,
you lose all your points
So it's up to you whether
or not to fight after each win.”{PAUSE}“They also make
it harder by givin' out handicaps.”{PAUSE}“They decide what
handicaps there'll be, and
you won't know what
you're up against until the battle.”{PAUSE}“Oh yeah, once you leave the Battle area,
all your battle points will
become useless. So watch it.”{PAUSE}“Oh, and one more thing. The maximum
points you could get is 65000,
no more. So if you get that many
you should exchange them for something.”

“Sir, that entrance is for the
challengers who have already
registered. Please register here.”

“Um, I'm sorry, that's only for registered
participants. You can't
enter there until
you register.”

“I'm sorry to announce that
our prizes have changed.
Your previous battle points
are no longer valid.”

“Welcome. You currently have
{VARDECR} battle points.”

“Would you like to exchange them?
{CHOICE}Yeah
{CHOICE}No, thanks

“Thank you very much.
Please remember, your battle
points become invalid
once you leave the Battle Arena.”

“Man, I knew I should've stopped.
But it's so hard to stop…”

“Maybe I could've made it a little further.
It's so hard to know when to stop…”

“All right, it should be my turn
comin' up here soon.”
“I'm not going to lose this time!”

“I'll give that Meteor my ultra kick…
…or…maybe not.”

“Hey, have you heard?
Something awful happened!”{PAUSE}“Two staff members and
some Shinra soldiers were shot.”{PAUSE}“The soldiers died instantly,
but the staff survived.”

“Those two over there eloped,
saying something about
'Our last moments together---'
I can't bear it.”{PAUSE}“I don't have anyone special in my life
but when it happens, it happens.”{PAUSE}“…that's why I'm working now.
Oh, sorry for going off like that…”

{Barret}
“Dyne…”

“You know, I've been thinking about it
for a while now,
but you must be pretty strong.”{PAUSE}“Probably strong enough to take on
the top 1 or 2 fighters?”{PAUSE}“Maybe you'll be good
enough for the big match…”{PAUSE} “How 'bout it? There's a private battle
only for the strongest. Wanna try?”
{CHOICE}Let's do it
{CHOICE}Not interested

“Register for battle?
The entrance fee is 10 GP.”
{CHOICE}Try the special battle
{CHOICE}Try the regular battle
{CHOICE}Not interested

“Register for battle?
The registration fee is 10 GP.”
{CHOICE}Let's do it
{CHOICE}Not interested

{CHOICE}{Party #1}

“You can fight up to eight battles.
But the more battles you fight,
the greater your handicap,
and stronger the monsters will become.”
“Well, good luck.”
“Seems like you do not have enough GP.”
